title: OpenPalm Community Snippet
description: Schema for a community-contributed OpenPalm channel, service, or automation snippet. Aligns with the stack-spec schema used by the compose generator.

kind.description: The type of resource this snippet defines

description.description: One or two sentences describing what this snippet does

supportsMultipleInstances.description: Whether users can install multiple instances of this snippet in the same stack

containerPort.description: Container port the service listens on

sharedSecretEnv.description: Environment variable name for the shared HMAC secret

description.description: Help text describing the variable's purpose

required.description: Whether a value or secret reference must be provided

default.description: Default value if none is provided
